definition: fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers

sentences.english: Compared to the natural purples , the enhanced ones have higher saturation of colour.
sentences.chinese: 相比自然姹紫嫣红，增强的高饱和度的颜色。

sentences.english: The spring snow melt, all things recovery, 10000 Purple Yan-hong, to give hope.
sentences.chinese: 春天冰雪融化，万物复苏，万紫嫣红，给人们希望。

sentences.english: Wu Yuegui was going to break off an engagement, and the road met gold rings and purples.
sentences.chinese: 吴月桂要到杨家退婚，路上遇见金环与嫣红。

sentences.english: The Blossoming of love in life, but also recall with nostalgia the network of song and laughter.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢生活中的姹紫嫣红，也留恋网络里的欢歌笑语。

sentences.english: Outside there is a layer of powdery white mold, cut after the bright red and dripping, scented.
sentences.chinese: 外面有一层粉状的白霉，切开后嫣红欲滴，香气四溢。

sentences.english: Gold was a ghost meter purples kid dozen.
sentences.chinese: 金环便出鬼计让嫣红把孩子打掉。

sentences.english: Though it was a colorful spring.
sentences.chinese: 虽然是姹紫嫣红的春天。

sentences.english: There were many red beautiful azalea , waving in the wind .
sentences.chinese: 坝旁边的山上有美丽嫣红的映山红在风中摇曳。

sentences.english: Her cheeks were flushed and red, and her eyes sparkled.
sentences.chinese: 她双颊嫣红，眼睛闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: Your garden will be full of green grass and gay flowers.
sentences.chinese: 你的花园将绿草成茵，姹紫嫣红。

sentences.english: Can not see the sky falling clouds bright red sand.
sentences.chinese: 沙子看不见落霞嫣红的天空。

definition: tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
(of a woman, a flower etc) delicate colors
see 櫻桃小嘴|樱桃小嘴[ying1 tao2 xiao3 zui3]
